definition: office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: NOC is Yuan Weimin, Ministry of the state General Administration for Sports.
sentences.chinese: 現任中國奧委會主席是國家體育總局局長袁偉民。

sentences.english: Li Chunlin was removed from the post of Director-General of the Price Control Administration of Jiangsu Province.
sentences.chinese: 免去李春林同志的江蘇省物價局副局長職務。

sentences.english: And earlier this month, the government executed its top food-and-drug regulator after convicting him on bribery charges.
sentences.chinese: 本月初，政府因受賄罪處決了原國家藥檢局的局長。

sentences.english: Director Zhang solved an intricate case soon after he took his post.
sentences.chinese: 局長剛上任不久就將一件無頭案偵破了。

sentences.english: Is it possible fme to see the harbour in person today?
sentences.chinese: 我今天是否有可能見到港務局局長本人？

sentences.english: Chief Economist of China Development Bank, Former Chief of the Energy Evaluation and Review Bureau;
sentences.chinese: 國家開發銀行總經濟師，原能源評審局局長。

sentences.english: Then, a official from the Zhuhai Bureau of Education made a speech first.
sentences.chinese: 接下來，會議開始了，珠海教育局副局長首先致辭。

sentences.english: The nation's cultural relics chief is opposed to the blind reconstruction of old city towns.
sentences.chinese: 國家文物局局長反對盲目改造舊城。

sentences.english: Any cigarettes in 1925 Guichi County Tax Bureau.
Sought the job of land officer in his home state - rejected.
sentences.chinese: 想在自己州內擔任土地局長的工作，遭到拒絕。

sentences.english: Wang Baoming was appointed Director of the Labor and Social Security Office of Zhengzhou.
sentences.chinese: 任命王保明爲鄭州市勞動和社會保障局局長。

sentences.english: The CIA chief—like his bosses and those before him—is a liar.
sentences.chinese: 中央情報局長如同他的老闆和前幾任一樣，都在撒謊。

sentences.english: Evans landed up by becoming Director of Education.
sentences.chinese: 埃文斯最後成了教育局長。

sentences.english: Mr. Zheng Guoguang, Director of China Meteorological Administration, attended the meeting and delivered a special report.
sentences.chinese: 中國氣象局局長鄭國光到會作專題報告。

sentences.english: Mr. Shi Wanxin, the director of the Education Bureau, comes to the school to guide us.
sentences.chinese: 濰坊市教育局副局長時萬信來我校檢查指導工作。

sentences.english: The current President of the NOC is Yuan Weimin, Ministry of the state General Administration for Sports.
sentences.chinese: 現任中國奧委會主席是國家體育總局局長袁偉民。

definition: head of a (government etc) department/section chief/section head/secretary/minister/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
